text: Mário Marques (born 23 September 1901, date of death unknown) was a Portuguese swimmer. He competed in the men's 200 metre breaststroke event at the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1901 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Portuguese male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Portugal Category:Swimmers at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing Category:Male breaststroke swimmers
title: Mário Marques
